name: U.A.K.G.: Untitled Alien Killing Game
description:
Simple Space Invaders clone where you have to destroy all your enemies by shooting at them. Kill them all before they reach the bottom of the screen! And, be careful, they shoot dangerous green bullets at you!

Move the ship with the left and right arrow keys, the A and D keys or the joystick input of your controller. To shoot you can press the left button click, the space bar or the right button of your controller (the button placed where the Play Station controller circle button is).
